<< rad2deg Trigonometric functions secd >>

sec

Secant of angle in radians.

Syntax

res = sec(x)

Input argument

x

a numeric value

Output argument

res

a numeric value

Description

sec computes the secant of argument in radians for each element of x.

Example

x = -pi:0.75:pi;
R = sec(x)

See also

secd.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
